revised_title: Experiments and Observations on the Effects of Poisons on Animals
tldr: The author describes various experiments conducted on animals using different types of poisons, including Dutch Nightshade, Hemlock, Wolfs-Bane, Meadow-Saffron, Opium, Monks-Hood, and Nux Vomica. The effects of these poisons on the animals are documented, and the author discusses the methods used to treat the poisoned animals.
